properties.title: Madrisa-Land
properties.abstract: Children's dreams come true in Madrisa-Land. Great adventures also await physically and visually impaired people at the adventure park on Madrisa near Klosters.
properties.description:
Madrisa-Land is aimed at families and is the first adventure park in the Alps that is also accessible to physically and visually impaired people.
                      
Experience play, fun and action in the Davos-Klosters region. The range of play equipment in Madrisa-Land is almost endless: jumping on the bouncy castle, climbing on the bouldering wall, on the climbing tree, the climbing tower and the rock fall. There is also a marble run, slides, sandpit, play gondola, swings, a wheelchair swing, a play hut, a slackline course, caves and numerous water games. 
                
After a day of fun and games, you can admire the sunset on the panorama terrace of the mountain restaurant. Spending the night in the tree huts, in the star suite in the Gad√§ or in the tipi tent will also be an unforgettable experience for young and old.
properties.name: Destination Davos Klosters
